Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
I will be Sir not-appearing-at-this-con

gl hf though

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content: I wanna go! And I need a ride. And I wanna go with you guys and stay until whenever you are coming back. Are we going to Yamamoto Yutaka Q&A btw? Man, I want his autograph.

Replies.Author: Cat
Replies.Content:
Definitely going, no surprise I’m sure ^\_^. I will need room for two and a large box on Friday and Saturday and need to leave after 5 on Friday to give friend a chance to get up here from Colorado Springs. I don’t have any other time restrictions and I’m not sure whether the box will be coming with me Saturday.

Sorry for being a pain ^\_^

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
I’d like to go, but I can’t say I’m 100% sure I can go along, yet. I probably can, though.

So if I do tag along, I’ll definitely need a ride.

Replies.Author: Cat
Replies.Content:
Definitely going but need a ride. I’ll be bringing a friend and cosplaying so need room for 2 and a large box for Friday and Saturday. I possibly may not take the box Saturday, though, if it proves too unweildy. On Friday, I will need to leave after 5 so that my friend can make it up here from Colorado Springs but that’s the only time requirement I have.

Sorry for being such a pain ^\_^

Replies.Author: Steve W
Replies.Content:
Looks like we have 4 that want to go so far. I have space for 4 in my car besides me, though it’ll likely be cramped (LOLMAZDA3).

I’ll be there on Friday to get my pass, and I plan to be there most of the day on Saturday and Sunday.

Since the only time restriction I have so far is after 5 on Friday, I’ll have a car good to go at 5 on Friday. We’ll meet in the IM Parking Lots, first come first serve. If you’re planning on driving, post when you’ll be driving.

Replies.Author: Cat
Replies.Content:
Sorry for causing so many issues but can you push back the leaving time to around 5:30? Forgot to factor in rush hour traffic.

Sorry!!!

Replies.Author: dante
Replies.Content: I continue to remain the wildcard. Things keep popping up (as is the way of my life), and I just do not know if I’ll be working tomorrow or not (or if I’m working for only half a day). Anyone who still needs a ride, feel free to make yourselves known, so we can talk. Either way, I’ll be there by tomorrow evening (6-7 at the latest).

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content: So, who’s giving me a ride? (man, I sound so rude.)

Replies.Author: Cat
Replies.Content: Umm, so is 5:30 okay? Sorry to switch things up but I don’t know if my friend can make it up by 5. Sorry again!

Replies.Author: Steve W
Replies.Content: Let’s just call it 6 then, same place. If somebody wants to call dibs on the other two spaces in my car \*cough\*chaeha\*cough\* call dibs in the responses lol.

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
Forgot to mention that I can leave any time after 4PM on Friday. So, to reiterate:

I would like to go.

I need a ride.

I can go any time after 4PM on Friday, and can be there any times on Sat/Sun.

I also am pretty sure Chris Lee is going so would like to travel with him, but I don’t mind squeezing in to any other vehicle, haha.

Replies.Author: Chris
Replies.Content:
I’ll probably be driving, unless everyone suddenly bails and we can fit into 2 cars.

I’ll be free after 5, so whenever you guys want to meet, that’s fine. Or 6, if that’s when everyone else is leaving.

Replies.Author: Ryan Settergren
Replies.Content:
I too shall be going to the convention. i plan on leaving tomorrow around 330 or 4 and staying for the charity poker if i can get a spot. I should be able to squeeze one more into my audi, so if anyone wants that spot, call dibs.

it’d be best if you shoot me an email (search my name on inside mines) with a phone number if you want the ride.

-Ryan

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content: I’d like to go with Chris Lee I guess. I mean, I kinda feel better with a fellow Korean. So when and where should I meet you?

Replies.Author: Chris
Replies.Content: I’m parked in the IM fields, around 5-ish? If no one else needs a ride besides you and Grant, we can leave whenever you guys are done with classes.

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content: I’m already done with classes, so I can leave whenever.

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content: I can be there at 4, if we won’t be waiting for anyone else.

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content: Actually, I can even be there at 3, since I don’t have to go to C++ today…

Replies.Author: Steve W
Replies.Content: Remember, nothing starts till 5 pm today lol

Replies.Author: dante
Replies.Content: It turns out that I (Matt Armijo) will need to be there by 7 PM Friday. If there are any stragglers that still need a ride, I will be LEAVING Mines by 6:15 PM. I currently don’t NEED to go to Mines, so IF you still need a ride down, reply to this message ASAP. This WILL be the last ride down to NDK.

Replies.Author: Cat
Replies.Content: My friend is running a bit late so I may not be there quite at 6, I don’t know right now \*stress\* \*stress\*.
